duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage senior leaders' calendars and schedule travel and meetings.
Handle highly sensitive and confidential data with discretion.
Support a team of administrators in various work activities.
Maintain the highest level of confidentiality concerning the organization and executive's role.
Prepare expense reports and plan meetings.
Interface collaboratively with internal executives, employees, and external clients.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or GED, Bachelor's degree preferred
